Package ru.hiddenproject.feelmeserver.service

Interface InvitationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InvitationServiceImpl
    public interface InvitationService
    Interface for operations with Invitation

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Invitation acceptInvitation​(Long id)
      Accepts invitation with id
      List<Invitation> getAllPendingInvitations​(Long id)
      Returns all invitations with InvitationStatus.PENDING status for user with id

      Searches for invitation with InvitationStatus.PENDING status

    • Method Detail

      • inviteUser

        Invitation inviteUser​(User originalUser,
                      User acceptedUser)
               throws DataExistsException
        Creates invitation from originalUser to acceptedUser
        Parameters:
        originalUser - Original user's data. (Who invites)
        acceptedUser - User's data to invite (Whom invited)
        Returns:
        Invitation data
        Throws:
        DataExistsException - if invitation for acceptedUser already exists

      • acceptInvitation

        Invitation acceptInvitation​(Long id)
                     throws DataExistsException,
                            DataNotExistsException
        Accepts invitation with id
        Parameters:
        id - Invitation id to accept
        Returns:
        Accepted invitation data
        Throws:
        DataExistsException - If invitation is not in InvitationStatus.PENDING status
        DataNotExistsException - If invitation with given id doesn't exists

      • rejectInvitation

        void rejectInvitation​(Long id)
               throws DataExistsException,
                      DataNotExistsException
        Accepts invitation with id
        Parameters:
        id - Invitation id to accept
        Throws:
        DataExistsException - If invitation is not in InvitationStatus.PENDING status
        DataNotExistsException - If invitation with given id doesn't exists

      • getAllPendingInvitations

        List<Invitation> getAllPendingInvitations​(Long id)
        Returns all invitations with InvitationStatus.PENDING status for user with id
        Parameters:
        id - User id
        Returns:
        List of invitations

      • setInvitationStatus

        Invitation setInvitationStatus​(Invitation invitation,
                               InvitationStatus status)
                        throws DataNotExistsException
        Changes invitation status to status
        Parameters:
        invitation - Invitation to change status
        status - New status of invitation InvitationStatus
        Returns:
        Updated invitation data
        Throws:
        DataNotExistsException - If invitation doesn't exists

      • getInvitation

        Invitation getInvitation​(Long id)
                  throws DataNotExistsException,
                         DataExistsException
        Searches for invitation with InvitationStatus.PENDING status
        Parameters:
        id - Invitation id
        Returns:
        Invitation data with given id
        Throws:
        DataNotExistsException - If invitation with given id doesn't exists
        DataExistsException - If invitation with given id is not in InvitationStatus.PENDING status
